body_html: @ezyang I am also working on a guide on how to SSH / multi-user RDP into the Windows EC2 machines and do development work (using vim / emacs, building PyTorch using the batch file, using Nsight to debug CUDA). I will add it to CONTRIBUTING.md when ready.

body: @ezyang I am also working on a guide on how to SSH / multi-user RDP into the Windows EC2 machines and do development work (using vim / emacs, building PyTorch using the batch file, using Nsight to debug CUDA). I will add it to `CONTRIBUTING.md` when ready.
